      • discover

        public static java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> discover(java.lang.String searchTarget,
                                                                                        int timeout,
                                                                                        int retries,
                                                                                        boolean returnfirst)
                                                                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Discover any UPNP device using SSDP (Simple Service Discovery Protocol).
        Parameters:
        timeout - in milliseconds
        searchTarget - if null it use "ssdp:all"
        Returns:
        List of parsed matching response messages
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        SSDP Wikipedia Page
